name: ApplicationContext

methods.name: getCanvasUrl
methods.description: Retrieves the fully qualified URL of the canvas app.

methods.name: getDeveloperName
methods.description: Retrieves the internal API name of the canvas app.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Retrieves the name of the canvas app.

methods.name: getNamespace
methods.description: Retrieves the namespace prefix of the canvas app.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.description: Retrieves the current version of the canvas app.

methods.name: setCanvasUrlPath
methods.description: Overrides the URL of the canvas app for the current request.

params.name: newPath
params.description: The URL (not including domain) that you need to use to override the canvas app URL.

description: Use this interface to retrieve application context information, such as the application version or URL.
